description: "This early 18th century map of Asia features a drawing of a woman burning offerings on an altar, while two children carry cornucopias, and a camel looks on. The Roman god Mercury descends from the sky in the background wearing his winged helmet."
label: "Descriptio hydrographica accommodata ad battavorum navagatione in Javam insulam Indie Orientalis, seatum ad quam postridie calendas Aprilis anno 1595 ex Hollandia solverunt et ex qua domum redierunt idus Augusti anno 1597 horum extus reditusq via his notis demonstratur de hac navigatione extat descriptio lectu perquam admiranda"
